item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

For a random number between 250 and some number you need to do

addItem(Item.randomRunes(), 250 + misc.random(#));

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows Reward trouble :)
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Ok, so I’m working on Barrows rewards, making em a little more realistic(ish) so, I add the random runes string, works fine, I get the reward. I get 1 of 3 random runes. I say "Ok, so I need to make it a random amount. So I add this…

addItem(Item.randomRunes(), misc.random(250));

I want the reward to be above 250 every time, but I go and get my reward, I get 5 laws, 126 minds, 4 natures… Any help?

Read full topic
